trans-unit.source: Similar effect as logging off and then on again. For example, changes to the %path% environment might not take effect until you call EnvUpdate() (or you logoff/reboot).

seg-source.mrk: Similar effect as logging off and then on again.
For example, changes to the %path% environment might not take effect until you call EnvUpdate() (or you logoff/reboot).

target.mrk: Similar effect as logging off and then on again.
For example, changes to the %path% environment might not take effect until you call EnvUpdate() (or you logoff/reboot).

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the system environment variable called %PATH%.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve the system environment variable called %PATH%.

trans-unit.source: Assign the system environment variable called %PATH% with its current value as well as the script directory.

trans-unit.source: When you assign an environment variable you do so minus the percentage signs (%).

trans-unit.source: Refresh the OS environment for changes to take affect.
